title: Herbal Baby Massage Oil (Mild & Organic)
excerpt: A gentle, organic baby massage oil with coconut/sesame base and mild herbs to nourish skin and calm infant Vata.
content:
## What Is This Baby Massage Oil?
A soft, nurturing oil created for infants using organic coconut or sesame oil with mild herbs like brahmi or calendula to support healthy skin and restful sleep.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Infant massage (abhyanga) is central to calming Vata, promoting growth, improving digestion, and helping babies sleep better.

### Key Benefits
- Moisturizes and protects delicate skin.
- Calms infant Vata and supports better sleep.
- Helps muscle and bone development.

## Ingredients
- Organic coconut or sesame oil
- Brahmi (mild infusion) or calendula

## Usage Instructions
- Warm slightly and massage gently daily for 5â€“10 minutes.
- Avoid eyes and nose.

## Packaging
- Small pump bottle with pediatrician advisory notes.

## Safety & Consultation
- Always patch-test first. Consult pediatrician before use on newborns or skin-sensitive infants.

## Why Choose This Oil?
Safe, mild, organic, and inspired by Ayurvedic nurturing traditions.
